title: Configuration Profile Schema
description: The accepted structure for a 'configuration profile' in the DESM tool

Agent.title: The information pertaining an agent that operates the platform

fullname.title: The name for this agent to display in the profile. Desirable format: <first name><space><last name>.

email.title: Email address for the agent. It will serve as the username in sessions.

phone.title: The american format phone number of the agent

githubHandle.title: The github username. Pattern is set according to the form validation messages on the 'Join Github' page

DSOSchema.title: A schema file that will be available to map inside the DESM tool instance for a specific standards organization.
DSOSchema.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

name.title: The name of the schema file

description.title: A detailed description of the schema file. E.g. what it represents, which concepts should be expected it to contain.

encodingSchema.title: The encodingSchema for this schema file

version.title: The version of the schema file

origin.title: The origin schema
origin.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

associatedConceptSchemes.title: The associated concept schemes for this schema file

associatedAbstractClass.title: The associated abstract classes for this schema file

SkosMetadata.title: Metadata about the skos file to be incorporated.

name.title: The name of the skos file.

version.title: The version of the skos file

description.title: A description what the skos file represents.

origin.title: The URL/s where the file content is available

StandardOrganization.title: An organization that specifies standards for data definitions and uses the DESM tool to map from a specification to another

email.title: Email address for the agent. It will serve as the username in sessions.

description.title: A description that provides consistent information about the standards organization

homepageURL.title: The homepage URL of the standards organization

standardsPage.title: The homepage URL of the standards organization

dsoAgents.title: The DSO agents that will use the DESM tool to map from a specification to another

associatedSchemas.title: The associated schema files
associatedSchemas.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

name.title: A name that denotes the purpose of this configuration profile. Preferably a single word

description.title: The description of the configuration profile
description.description: An explanation about the purpose of this configuration profile.
examples: This configuration profile is meant to hold mapping of specification related to the education area, with domains like student, organization, grade, etc.

createdAt.title: The date of creation for this specific configuration profile

updatedAt.title: The date of last modification of this specific configuration profile.
